casebody.data:
157 A.3d 809 MONARCH ACADEMY BALTIMORE CAMPUS v. BALTIMORE CITY BOARD OF SCHOOL COMM’RS. Pet. Docket No. 598,

Sept.Term, 2016

Court of Appeals of Maryland. April 4, 2017

Reported below: 231 Md.App. 594, 153 A.3d 859.

Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Transferred to the regular docket as No. 7, Sept. Term, 2017.
